description.en:
Damaya with Site Pier Country court which received the life to summon the savior to save the world. 
However, it was "Hanashika" that Damaya mistakenly summoned. 
This is a story that a rustic house saves the world with rakugo.

[b]Terminology :[/b]
[*]Damaya: Derived from Sanskrit word damayati, "Control and command oneself".　Can Be Read as People with "Indulgently"
[*]Hanashika : A professional "rakugo" storyteller
[*]Rakugo : (落語, literally "fallen words") is a form of Japanese verbal entertainment. The lone storyteller sits on stage. Using only a paper fan and a small cloth as props, and without standing up from the seiza sitting position, the rakugo artist depicts a long and complicated comical (or sometimes sentimental) story. The story always involves the dialogue of two or more characters. The difference between the characters is depicted only through change in pitch, tone, and a slight turn of the head.

[b]Links:[/b]
[*][url=http://ncode.syosetu.com/n9574di/]Original Web Novel[/url] (Raw)
